website_summaries.verdict: Best kit if the idea of sticking something large in your ear makes you squirm.
pros: Users love that the single-dose pipette ensures they aren't using too much or too little ear wax removal solution
Smaller and less intimidating than other kits
cons: For best results, you should lie down for 30 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I can hear
customer_reviews.text: Between working in a Mechanical Test Lab for 20 years, !5 years of Finish Carpentry, and several years of playing Southern Rock I figured I was just going deaf. Doc said my ears were full of wax. Tried for weeks with liquids and bulb syringe. Nada! Used this in one ear with the liquid the other without. Bingo! Both worked. Amazing how well this thing worked. This thing was engineered perfectly. Set up Alexa to remind me to use this each month. Funny how a simple thing like this can improve your life. I SAID, FUNNY HOW A SIMPLE THING LIKE THIS CAN IMPROVE YOUR LIFE! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Used twice in last 4 months. Got bug size wax build up out
customer_reviews.text: This got a huge bug size build up of wax out! I knew it was a lot cuz it took me two packets to get it out. I was completely deaf. Disgusting
customer_reviews.author: satxdonkey

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit worked great in removing a large buildup of wax in my ears. I applied the fluid to my ear, and took a little rest on the bed. 25 minutes later, I started using the pump to flush them out. Left ear wasn't too bad, and the little bit of wax came right out. I then did the right ear the same way, A monstrous wax plug came out after a bit of irrigating, and all is well. There are 10 doses of the wax dissolving substance, enough for 5 complete cleanings. This is a product that does exactly what I expected it to do, and I'm 100% satisfied with it..
customer_reviews.author: Bill Seward

customer_reviews.title: Cured my swimmer's ear!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from recurring swimmer's ear for about a month until I finally tried the liquid that came with this pack and the syringe. Home remedies didn't have any lasting effect. Once I kept the liquid in for over 30 mins and used two syringes of water, my sink was chunky. It was kind of disturbing what came out of my ear but I was so happy to have it out! My swimmer's ear cleared up and I can hear perfectly out of my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this stuff twice now. This works great. My mom gets terrible wax build up in her ears, so bad that it makes it so she can't hear. I have to take her to the doctor every few months to have her ears cleaned out. Yes, it is that bad. This kit works better than anything I've found and with it I have been able to lengthen the time between doctor visits for cleaning. She is happy, I'm happy and best of all....she can hear me!
customer_reviews.author: Mysteri

customer_reviews.title: Led to ear problems and a dr bill !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff unfortunately led to an ear infection according to my dr and didn’t clean my ears , could’ve just been my bodies response to it. Would not purchase again personally however may work great for others !!! Few days after using I couldn’t hear and had pain went to dr she said I had a major inflamed ear inside and to stop using whatever I used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works with some work!
customer_reviews.text: I had a clogged ear for about a week or maybe maybe longer and was desperate to clear it out. I tried the ear candles, debrox, other Over the counter drops etc... nothing worked! I received this and followed the instructions exactly. It didn’t work! :/ I was disappointed! I read all the reviews on here and in the morning tried again! I did the drops at night then the water irritigation thing but in the morning I just did the water irrigation for about 8-10 minutes with warmer than body temp water and that did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: DinaRae

customer_reviews.title: This really works, may take more than 1 session
customer_reviews.text: After swimming several weeks ago my right ear became completely blocked and a slight ringing sound developed. After trying several other products I tried this kit. Took 3 sessions but on the third ALL of the stick wax came out (quite gross, some large balls of wax) and I can now hear 100% again, what a great feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I had a clogged ear for a few weeks, ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a clogged ear for a few weeks, and nothing worked to get it unclogged. Finally, I decided to get this kit, and it worked! I had to use it a few times, but it cleared out all the nasty earwax that was clogging it. I used it on my other ear too, and it cleared out all the nasty earwax from that ear too. My hearing has improved too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kasa

customer_reviews.title: Do your ears get clogged up?
customer_reviews.text: For the second time in 5 months, I have had to use this to get rid of dead skin and wax buildup in my right ear and it has worked both times. It creates a spinning vortex and flushes the build up right out. Use the included drops over the course of a few days and then flush it out. Make sure to use some warm water in the syringe. It might take multiple attempts to flush it out, but eventually, it will.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney.

customer_reviews.title: Good product - probably best suited for those with significant wax build up
customer_reviews.text: I tried this ear wax removal kit, and while the product itself is good, for me it hasn't seemed worth the trouble. Maybe my ear wax problems weren't as bad as I thought, but using this product did not seem to lead to any discernible difference in how I felt (whereas using some metal tools made a big difference). I would probably recommend getting a metal earwax removal kit (curettes), and seeing how that goes before purchasing this product and taking the time it takes to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in disgusting conditions
customer_reviews.text: The product actually worked, but now I feel I might have actually used a product that was RETURNED. I couldn't hear out of my right ear for 5 days and this solved the problem. But after using it, I should have waited because of the conditions it arrived in. I just really needed to solve my ear problem. No packaging inside, some disgusting substance all over the wilted box. The earplugs were in the packaging though.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Cleared out what the doctor could not.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't post reviews but this product is fabulous. I had some earwax that was blocking up my hearing and even the physician who was looking at it couldn't get it out. However, only a half hour later and this little guy had it out! I won't post a picture (because... ew) but it was a considerable amount it got just the very first time. My ear feels so, so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good ear cleaning system!
customer_reviews.text: I have extreme amount of wax build up that I use to make a dr visit to clean. But this works pretty good when I have excessive build up. It is simple concept but it can be challenging to get the right angle to place it in your ear to remove the wax. Also you have to use alot of water pressure acouple times to dislodge the wax. But it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Love20

customer_reviews.title: Tip bent/broken
customer_reviews.text: As with some other people here. Ours came with a broken/bent tip. No easy way to send back because of the "stay at home" instructions so just a waste of money. Fortunately it was only $10 but it's still rather annoying because we needed to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Graymatter

customer_reviews.title: Good for wax, not to “unclog”
customer_reviews.text: I clean my ears and this actually took out a small piece of wax I didn’t know I had. The only thing is it did not unclog my ears which is what I was hoping for... but since that isn’t the primary goal of the product I won’t take 2 stars off... just one.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Used product ?
customer_reviews.text: Aren’t drops supposed to be sealed? Mine weren’t, and they leaked. Bottle was half full, another thing was the ear plug thing, it seamed greasy too, you’d think that probably because the drops leaked, but it was only one that seamed greasy and they were in a little ziplock bag, makes me thing those where used and that’s why the drops bottle wasn’t sealed or tight. I tried contacting the seller and no response whatsoever. UPDATE: I received a replacement and it worked perfectly fine. Update to 4 stars. I would give it 5, but it was a bit of an inconvenience that the first order wasn’t right.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pino

customer_reviews.title: Ear wax remover
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a otoscope to see what was causing my left ear not to hear. I was shocked to find a wall of wax deep inside my ear. Not being a professional in removing wax with the tools that came with the scope. I was to afraid to stick the scoop tool in my ear. I saw this product and read the reviews. I gave it try, I followed the instructions and was so happy with the results. My left ear is fully wax free and I can finally hear out of it. The product didn't hurt at all but did feel weird. Overall I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired physician now but when I was in active practice, I have always counseled my patients to purchased a home ear cleaning kit rather than waste their time and an appointment with me just to have ear wax removed. Most of the times, I use a syringe with a special metal tip plus warm water to flush out the wax though sometimes I do have to resort to using a suction tip. So when I started to have wax problems, I decided to take my own counsel and after some research, bought this product. The product worked well and did the job it was meant to do. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hanumancat

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I had an impaction that would probably required removal by a doctor. I had to use the solution more times than suggested, and leave it in the ear longer; but now I'm hearing clearly again. I'm very pleased with the product. Follow the directions carefully for using the rinse syringe. I found that to much pressure applied to the ear can affect your balance for up to a minute or more.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. It only made my ear worse. Definitely did t get any wax out. I have had better luck flushing my ear with a dental irrigation syringe, warm water and a little peroxide. You can buy those here on amazon for less than $4. Save your money. Do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm Officially a Kyrosol Cult Member
customer_reviews.text: My ear got super blocked and NOTHING that I tried fixed it at all. Hydrogen peroxide, olive oil, suction tool....I couldn't hear anything for 5 days. This thing was a frickin' miracle. The amount of built up wax that came out of my ear was unbelievable. It was both disgusting and satisfying. Most importantly: I CAN HEAR AGAIN. Both ears are completely clear and I will be keeping this in stock from here on out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AdventureAddict

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use, but didn't seem very effective. My husband says he can hear better, but I never saw anything significant come out of his ear. You have to keep the product in your ear for about 30 minutes too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Y. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Capsule's liquid evaporates, stay away
customer_reviews.text: All of the capsules evaporate as the capsule itself is so poorly and cheaply made. And the ones you get to use, really don't expect much. Don't expect much from the ear cleaner tool either, jusy a bad product. I really don't get the positive reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Josito

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I got it to clean my ears without using q-tips. The syringe on this is worth double it’s price IMO, it’s well made, the tip doesn’t hurt and it gets the job done without injury.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Completely cleared!
customer_reviews.text: My ear was completely clogged and This products cleared my ear completely! I would say that when using the syringe make sure to push it with some force. I wasn’t pushing it hard enough at first but once I started flushing the water in my ear hard, the wax was coming right out. Very happy with this product and will use at least once a month to make sure I don’t get wax build up again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good bye ear wax!
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Works better than the normal over the counter ear wax removal kits I've used. Great for hearing aid wearers like myself. It worked the first time I used it...I didn"t have to do it 2 or 3 times to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jer-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Did literally nothing, I followed the instructions to the T and nothing happened
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hennegan

customer_reviews.title: Liquid lacks in ability to dissolve earwax. But The irrigation device is far superior
customer_reviews.text: Liquid lacks in ability to dissolve earwax. Had to use several times and then it just stopped working. I believe that more cleansing agent such as peroxide may help. The irrigation device is far superior than any other products i have used. But the liquid remover needs more boost.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. Nothing came out of my ears and I don’t hear better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna

customer_reviews.title: EAR WAX REMOVAL
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to remove ear wax build up. The wax was built up so much that my ear was clogged and it was hard for me to hear. I followed the directions and probably used the suction action about 3-4 times to remove the wax buildup. It was great to hear again!! Tip: This product works best if the person with the wax build up inserts the plunger in their own ear. You want to insert the plunger as shown in the directions to make a tight seal. Then either the person with the wax builder or another person then pushes the plunger so the water goes into the ear to remove the wax.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynGal

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My ears were impacted and this stuff really works! I got multiple chunks out of each ear.
customer_reviews.author: Chocoleon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem to work.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this 3 times so far. I sincerely doubt I have absolutely nothing in my ears, but that’s exactly what came out... absolutely nothing. I followed the instructions to the letter all three times. Maybe I’m the only human with no ear wax.
customer_reviews.author: CSL Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I can hear again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, but it got out some big chunks of wax out of my ear. It wasn't painful either. I had some impacted wax and with the one they use at the dr's office, it hurt sooo bad. I cried like a baby (and i'm grown). This was for sure pain free and easy to use. Will definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ezma

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great. After the first use I could hear again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my husband's ears. It worked like a charm. The pressure was not so strong that it made him feel uncomfortable. We had to actually use a couple of 12 oz cups of water to get them flushed but it did exactly what it is advertised to do. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I did my whole family's ears with this and we got nothing out of our ears. I know we have stuff in there I see it with our scope. Also, there is no place to really grip the syringe and it slips and hurts . Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of great reviews so I decided to give this product a shot due to Covid-19 and not wanting to make a doctor's appointment. It made my ear worse and I've damaged it even further. My recommendation, go to an ENT for your ear issues. I still can't hear and the pain is awful. I don't complain hardly at all, but I'm worried I have a perforated ear drum now.
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a follow up to Debrox ear drops, and it worked great. The Debrox loosened the wax (used it for two days) then as a follow up I used the solution that came with the syringe and presto, after a few rinses the wax came out! Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mom who was feeling a blockage in her ear. She is the CLEANEST person I've ever met and without being too graphic, the amount of stuff we removed out of her ear was just incredible! Planning on using on myself soon hoping I'm not disgusted at myself! Mom is feeling much better, no pain and just planning on keep using it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopshopshop

customer_reviews.title: Main item was not in box
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this box to use for my ears.........my box has no Carbamide Peroxide bottle in box........not happy
customer_reviews.author: JulieAAtkinson-Elde

customer_reviews.title: Healthy ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better for my ears than q-tips. People don’t realize when they’re using q-tips they’re actually stuffing their ears full of extra wax rather than cleaning them out. This is great to clean them and it is reusable so it lasts a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: LeAna S. McNemar

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd be able to get more water pressure in my ear with this than a regular ear syringe, but it was much less, especially with that ear attachment on it. This thing all it did was get my ear canal wet.
customer_reviews.author: Don Beusee

customer_reviews.title: ****Awesome Product ****
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time. My ears produce excessive wax. To the point where they are completely blocked. This product worked great. Completely cleared all the wax buildup out of my ears.Can hear much better now. Definitely will use this product again. very minimally invasive. Would Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used exactly as directed. Nothing came out. Had terrible earache for 2 days. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: This product is jammed into a box so small that I can't see how many wouldn't arrive damaged. The tip was crushed and the stream mostly dribbles out. Would like a refund but product is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: I can hear again
customer_reviews.text: One does not notice the slow loss of hearing due to wax buildup but this stuff helped clean my ear out and now I have no excuse for not hearing the wife.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders. After a bad experience at the doctors with getting my ears cleaned, I turned to this product. I'll never try anything else after finding this.
customer_reviews.author: Luca C.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a couple of times but it works. Go easy on the flushing step.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works good. Bit of advice use warm water not hot but warm and it helps. Be careful of splashback ( my daughter moved and it got deflected off her ear back at me) definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miner

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had to be seen by the pediatrician multiple times for wax build up, after watching them do the errogations in office I decided to see if it was available for home use. This product may even be better than what his pediatrician uses. We used this right away (I suggest using during bath or shower) and got huge chunks of wax out which my son had been complaining about his ears being clogged again.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Damaged tip...
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing! The tip of the ear washer syringe, that supposed to be designed for optimum safety, arrived in a very damaged condition. I just ask myself HOW, since it came in a hard case. I couldn't even tryed it, hence the 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rosa Caruso

customer_reviews.title: EAR INFECTION WARNING
customer_reviews.text: This thing gave me a horrible ear infection, it’s been 2 weeks of suffering so far and having to pay a lot of money for drs visits and medicine 👎
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product
customer_reviews.text: Wow, incredible. I was dubious whether this would actually work, for I’ve thought my ears were so clogged I needed a specialist. And this worked!!! I can hear everything again, and it’s so joyful!! Only sad news is that I can hear my own snoring again
customer_reviews.author: Ling Qu

customer_reviews.title: I was VERY hopeful considering the past good reviews, however
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY hopeful considering the past good reviews, however, this product did not work for me whatsoever and was a complete disappointment, waste of time and money unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Best thing we've tried
customer_reviews.text: My husband has cauliflower ear and gets ALOT of wax buildup. I've tried so many different things and THIS is by far the best! It took slot of flushing but big chunks of wax came out and he can hear again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with excessive earwax production - and this little gadget saves me a trip to a doctor's office every couple of months. Very simple to use, quite effective. I suggest not using it too often, as earwax does act as a protective barrier to isolate foreign material... but when that wax starts acting as earplugs, definitely use it to flush things out.
customer_reviews.author: Action Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Don’t care for the drops but it was worth buying to get the ear irrigator and the ear plug to use with my usual ear drops
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: It works!!! BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible. The solution and the ear rinsing syringe both worked amazingly. Large ear wax plugs came out of both my ears and it was so satisfying! I can hear again and my ears don’t plug up when laying my head on my pillow. So worth it, BUY THIS if you think you have a wax buildup!
customer_reviews.author: mark moran

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I should have bought the one with the spray bottle and the foaming ear cleanser
customer_reviews.author: XTINE❤️

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The solution is magic. Gets so much nasty wax out. The syringe can be used couple times a week with regular water.
customer_reviews.author: Claugo

customer_reviews.title: This thing works amazing! I also take the tip off and put ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works amazing! I also take the tip off and put it on a waterpik to use in removing the wax. That seems to work as well and is a bit easier for me. I do like this and ended up ordering more of them to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: DebMc

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t hear well, now I can.
customer_reviews.text: 30 minutes of it sitting in my ear, warm water w the syringe in the ear, move that sucker in there when you’re squirting, and there ya go ear plugs are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t lie down for the first time, so the effect was not very good. The second time, I lay on my side for 20 minutes and then rinsed, the effect was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work quite well
customer_reviews.text: The process takes awhile but is thorough. Multiple uses and reusable makes this a good value for an ear cleaner and I'd guess it gives a deeper clean than an ear vac.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Addleman

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Can't ask more from a product. Had a ringing in my right ear going on 2 weeks. Knew it wasn't an infection so I did some research and found this product. Followed the directions and my ear is clear. Give it a minute or two after you flush the ear for all the water to come out or drain.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great ear wax removal tool
customer_reviews.text: Great ear wax removal tool although I’m not sure if the the ear wax drops actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Breton

customer_reviews.title: and this is a great kit for the task
customer_reviews.text: I have to clean my ears a couple of times a year, and this is a great kit for the task.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Casey

customer_reviews.title: I can hear now!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been having trouble with my hearing for about a month and finally couldn’t take the clogged feeling anymore. I usually have my ears cleaned annually at the doctor’s office but decided to try this home remedy. After using the oil in the pipettes in both ears and then the syringe I was amazed at how much wax gunk was clogging my hearing. I didn’t realize how my hearing had become diminished. I can hear everything now! This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: handydandy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the try
customer_reviews.text: The kyrosol works like a charm. I put the stuff in as directed and it cleaned things right out. I really like the syringe to push the water through the ear as well. It works way better than what I used to use. I'm very happy with this product and also happy that it isn't ridiculously expensive as well!
customer_reviews.author: HRH Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it on my right ear, currently doing my left as I write this. I love it and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sadira Turner

customer_reviews.title: The plunger syringe fills easily and as you squirt it into your ear it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have ear wax build up, then this device is worth it. I have not used the special drops that came with it yet. I used it with just regular store bought ones, but the little syringe works really well. The plunger syringe fills easily and as you squirt it into your ear it’s like a gentle but firm flow of water. I think this worked much better than just letting the shower run into my ear. I had better results. This comes with its own little plastic case so it stores easily. This was worth the money I think.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work, gave it a few shots, still did not help much.
customer_reviews.author: Krypto

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: So I tried this product 2 times on same ear and absolutely nothing came out! I left in ear for recommended 30 min then flushed out. Nothing. I’ll go see my doctor to clean it out my ear. Reviews said it helped some folks but it didn’t help me.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is not a suction at all. It washes your ears and this is not what the product states. It’s false advertising! I am highly disappointed. And will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: AB Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really work for me. Had to go to Dr for prescription stuff. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ingram

customer_reviews.title: May not work for all..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this product to work. Had some hearing loss, head pressure and headache due to impacted ear wax. I did several treatments and many rinses and the wax did not budge. Had to go to the doc unfortunately. This might be a good product for regular maintenance if you have excessive ear wax like me.
customer_reviews.author: L.Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Worked first time!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had a plugged ear on and off for a month now. After trying other products with limited success I decided to give this a try before taking him to the Dr. This worked the first time and was not painful or irritating. It was however one of the most disgusting things I have done.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked incredibility good on my 5 year old daughter! There was no pain and I just put on a cartoon and had her lay her head on my lap for the 30mins you keep the stuff in for. She got kinda twitchy toward the end but both her and I are greatful to have found this!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie Swallow

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly as described and was comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as described and was comfortable to use. I laid on my side and watched television while it worked and rinsed on the commercial. It gets deep in your ear and washes completely out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mannarino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for anyone who loves super clean ears or has a over waxing issue like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Welker

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: This was useless for me. Might be good for children but not adults.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a plugged left ear for a week - not anymore thanks to this irrigator - got my hearing back I am so thrilled with this product!! You can pay a lot more money to go go a doctor and get irrigated or pay the $10 and do it yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Williams

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product. My advice is to not give up. It will eventually work.
customer_reviews.author: andrea witmer

customer_reviews.title: Ruined package
customer_reviews.text: When I received it the ear drop were opened and ruined the package :/
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Hodge

customer_reviews.title: This product works just like they say!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to work remarkably well. I had a clogged ear after a plane ride that wouldn't go away, one use and I was back to normal. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gierszewski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that's managed to clean my ears out properly in my whole life. I have very stubborn wax, which as a kid was solved with peroxide solution and squirming in my mother's lap while she assaulted me with a bobby pin. Great product, probably going to use it for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Scheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Yes. It works
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years of having to go to the ear doctor to get my ears unplugged I have finally found a product that works. Easy to use, simple, safe and effective. Make sure you get the water to the correct temperature or you will get dizzy.
customer_reviews.author: abe froman

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good seller, nice product. It didn’t do anything for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this but as you can see it worked. I plan on doing a few more treatments because I can tell there is more in there. Also going to try on my other ear just to clean it out. Very impressed, wish more came out.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well with no mess, but takes two people to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tallgoat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do and was worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! Had some impacted earwax on my ear drum which was causing pain and some hearing issues. Put the drops in, waited 20 mins and flushed with warm water and my ear canal is sqeaky clean! No pain or irritation from the product.
customer_reviews.author: John Iglesia

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product without hesitation. The kit performs better than expected and is very easy to use. Do when I yell at the kids to do their chores they cannot claim they couldn't hear me!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, certainly not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Havent removed a stuck plug using it yet. Ive prevented a plug using it once. 20 to 30 minutes on your side is asking a bit much in my opinion. Id rather have this than one of those spray can wax removers.
customer_reviews.author: TJ McGee

customer_reviews.title: Super effective.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this device. This helped clean things out quickly. It seems very safe. There are plenty of "doses" of the cleaning fluid. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: TheDeLay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Tried this twice for my daughter's ear wax build up. It didn't work and made her ears feel very clogged up. Dr. Said it caused swimmers ear. ☹
customer_reviews.author: Grace Winters

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: My son gets a ton of wax buildup and this products truely helps get all the stuff out. He doesn't complain at all and says it actually feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Elanea

customer_reviews.title: I can hear again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that cleans my clogged ears every time.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: This is a fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well! I love this kit! I was having problems removing the ear wax before I got this and when I tried this product for the first time, I was really amazed at how wonderful it worked!
customer_reviews.author: T.A.

product_meta.title: Squip Kyrosol-All Natural Ear Wax Removal Kit
product_meta.description: Kyrosol uses a glycerin-based, wax solving solution and was developed to dissolve and flush out hard, dry or impacted wax buildups. Syringe feature allows user to control the flow for maximum comfort during the rinsing process. Patented technology for optimum safety and comfort. Kit includes ear rinser, storage case, 15ml/0.5 oz. bottle of glycerin ear drops, ear plug, storage case and instructions. Please read complete instructions inside the box before use.
feature_bullets: Syringe feature allows user to control the flow for maximum comfort during the rinsing process
Patented technology for optimum safety and comfort
10 all-natural, single-dose pipettes for easy delivery into the ear and maximum hygiene without risk of contamination
Kit includes ear rinser, storage sleeve, ear plug, 10 single-dose Kyrosol pipettes and instructions.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
